summary.span: 命名空间包含用于将对象序列化为 XML 格式文档或流的类。

span.span: The namespace contains classes that are used to serialize objects into XML format documents or streams.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 命名空间中的中心类是 类。The central class in the namespace is the class. 若要使用此类，请使用 构造函数创建类的实例，该实例使用要序列化的对象的类型。To use this class, use the constructor to create an instance of the class using the type of the object to serialize. 创建后 ，创建要序列化的对象的实例。Once an is created, create an instance of the object to serialize. 还必须创建对象以将文件写入文档或流，如 、 或 。You must also create an object to write the file to a document or stream, such as a , , or . 然后，可以调用 方法将对象转换为 XML 文档。You can then call the method to convert the object into an XML document. 若要从 XML 文档反序列化对象，请创建合适的对象来读取文档或流（同样， ， 或 ）。To deserialize an object from an XML document, create a suitable object to read the document or stream (again, a , , or ). 在将 生成的对象强制转换为原始对象（已序列化）的类型时调用方法。Invoke the method while casting the resulting object to the type of the original object (that was serialized). 为了进一步控制序列化， 命名空间包含多个 可应用于类的成员的类。To further control the serialization, the namespace contains several classes that can be applied to members of a class. 例如，如果某个类包含将被序列化为 XML 元素的成员，则可以将该特性应用于 该成员。For example, if a class contains a member that will be serialized as an XML element, you can apply the attribute to the member. 应用特性时，可以使用属性指定详细信息，如实际 XML 元素名称 。When applying the attribute, you can specify details such as the actual XML element name using the property. 有关所有属性的完整列表，请参阅 类概述。For a complete list of all the attributes, see the class overview.
